metadata.description: This First Edition Citizenship NFT provides the holder with access to Satoshi Island and exclusive Satoshi Island software. Satoshi Island Citizenship NFTs are in no way associated with citizenship of the Republic Of Vanuatu and do not permit entry to the country or any special immigration entitlements. To receive the rights and benefits that Satoshi Island Citizenship NFTs provide, the holder is required to agree to the T&Cs available via official Satoshi Island websites and smart contracts. The Classic Seal of this Citizenship NFT is 1 of only 4 Metallic NFTs and the only NFT in the collection to have the Gold & Black Color. The Meta Islander Specialty trait of this NFT is 1 of only 210 NFTs in the collection to receive free entry to Satoshi Island Metaverse events and competitions.
metadata.name: No. 1
